column2: You are a member of the Free Peoples of Middle-Earth, and work with others to hold the Shadow at bay.
column3: Vous êtes un membres des Peuples Libres de la Terre du Milieu, et vous tentez de banir Sauron hors de ce monde.

column2: The Valar have abandoned the Middle-Earth to its fate. Perhaps, it would be wise to ... join the winning side and serve Morgoth willingly?
column3: @FIXME@ The Valar have abandoned the Middle-Earth to its fate. Perhaps, it would be wise to ... join the winning side and serve Morgoth willingly?

column2: Your liege-lord has submitted to Morgoth! Do you declare independence, or keep to your oaths?
column3: @FIXME@ Your liege-lord has submitted to Morgoth! Do you declare independence, or keep to your oaths?

column2: I will not serve this traitor!
column3: @FIXME@ I will not serve this traitor!

column2: Ally with Morgoth? Your will has turned to madness, and you are faithless and accursed! I declare my bond to you broken.
column3: @FIXME@ Ally with Morgoth? Your will has turned to madness, and you are faithless and accursed! I declare my bond to you broken.

column2: I'll see you dead for this!
column3: @FIXME@ I'll see you dead for this!

column2: None can withstand the will of Morgoth.
column3: @FIXME@ None can withstand the will of Morgoth.

column2: Your liege-lord has submitted to Morgoth! Do you leave his court, or follow him into darkness?
column3: @FIXME@ Your liege-lord has submitted to Morgoth! Do you leave his court, or follow him into darkness?

column2: I will not serve this traitor!
column3: @FIXME@ I will not serve this traitor!

column2: It is not my place to question you, my Liege. You lead, and I follow.
column3: @FIXME@ It is not my place to question you, my Liege. You lead, and I follow.

column2: You are mad, we cannot submit to Morgoth!
column3: @FIXME@ You are mad, we cannot submit to Morgoth!

column2: Then leave, while you still can...
column3: @FIXME@ Then leave, while you still can...

column2: Treating with Morgoth seems like madness, but if this is what it takes to ensure the survival of our people...
column3: @FIXME@ Treating with Morgoth seems like madness, but if this is what it takes to ensure the survival of our people...

column2: An emissary from the Dark Lord appears - he demands your allegiance and aid in his wars. "Accept, and you shall have the friendship of Melkor. Reject, and you shall suffer the wrath of a God!"
column3: Un émissaire de Sauron se présente devant vous. Il réclame votre allégeance et votre aide dans les guerres à venir. "Acceptez, et vous aurez l'amitié du Mordor. Rejetez, et souffrez la colère de mon Seigneur et Maitre!".

column2: None can withstand the will of Morgoth!
column3: Personne ne peut résister à la Volonté de Sauron!

column2: My people are not slaves of Angband!
column3: Mon Peuple n'est pas esclave du Mordor!

column2: Perhaps you were wrong, perhaps Morgoth is not the reightful ruler of Arda. Maybe your people deserve hope, and not fear. If you dare, you could forsake the darkness, and try to help the enemies of the Dark Lord.
column3: @FIXME@ Perhaps you were wrong, perhaps Morgoth is not the rightful ruler of Arda. Maybe your people deserve hope, and not fear. If you dare, you could forsake the darkness, and try to help the enemies of the Dark Lord.

column2: As a creature of Melkor's making, you are corrupted by Darkness and work with other evil rulers to defeat those who stand in your way.
column3: @FIXME@ As a creature of Melkor's making, you are corrupted by Darkness and work with other evil rulers to defeat those who stand in your way.

column2: Surrender to the Power of Evil
The Forces of Evil are getting stronger. Their power is growing. You are a wise person and a provident ruler, you may have to take a heavy decision for sake and salvation of your people: Surrender.
column3: Les Forces de Sauron sont de plus en plus puissantes, et vous êtes une personnage sage, et un dirigeant avisé. Vous avez le pouvoir de protéger votre Peuple… Vous vous agenouiller devant le pouvoir de Sauron.

column2: Anger, blood and death all around us... Our people are slaves of the Dark Forces and suffer countless pains because of the wars which we are involved in. Let us break the chains that keep us tied, let us become a Free People and fight for the peace and freedom of Middle-earth!
column3: Colère, Sang et Mort sont sur nous ! Notre Peuple a trop longtemps été l'esclave du Seigneur Noir, et nous avons trop souffert des guerres dans lesquelles nous avons été embarquées. Il est temps de se libérer. Brisons nos chaines, et rejoignons les Peuples Libres dans leur combat contre Sauron !
Ce personnage a rejeté les Ténèbres, et est fait de nouveau partie des Peuples Libres.
Ce personnage s'est laissé séduire par Sauron, et a rejoins ses légions en vue de sa Grande Guerre.
